properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Toire ebigeni, ae ebigeni,
toire ebigeni
(ase altari
yo omonene tata). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Omogati ne ebini,
tomoirere me ebigeni. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chibesa chio omobuko,
tomoirere me ebigeni. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ebimeri bia mogondo,
tomoirere me ebigeni. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Abana baito bonsi,
tomoirere me ebigeni. x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Chisara chiaito chionsi,
tomoirere me ebigeni. x2
